name: homebridge-control-for-raycast
title: HomeBridge Control for Raycast
description: Seamlessly manage your Homebridge accessories with this Raycast plugin. Instantly toggle devices on or off, and enjoy quick access to your smart home controls
author: krishjoshi

commands.name: manage-homebridge-devices
commands.title: Homebridge
commands.description: Control and monitor your Homebridge-connected devices directly from Raycast.

preferences.title: Homebridge URL
preferences.name: url
preferences.description: The URL of your Homebridge server. By default, Homebridge runs on port 8581.

preferences.title: Homebridge Username
preferences.description: Your Homebridge username is stored securely in your macOS Keychain.
preferences.name: username

preferences.title: Homebridge Password
preferences.description: Your Homebridge password is stored securely in your macOS Keychain.
preferences.name: password

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
